value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative

value.title: Understanding the basics of Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: What is Power BI Premium? Let's look at how you can use it within Power BI. From benefits to how to acquire, this should get you up to speed.  Ideas Item Paginated reports in Pro https://ideas.powerbi.com/forums/265200-power-bi-ideas/suggestions/35959420-paginated-reports-please-make-it-available-in-pr

value.title: Using the Key Influencer visual in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick and Justyna look at how you gain insights using the Key Influencer visual in Power BI Desktop. This is the first Power BI AI visual, with more to come.  Follow Justyna on Twitter - https://twitter.com/JustynaLucznik  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton

value.title: Working with images in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to work with images in Power BI. He isn't talking about adding a logo into your report. This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: How to Create Power BI TOP N Report (Variable TOP N Filter)
value.excerpt: Let me show you how you can create a TOP N Report in Power BI, with a Variable N, so that you can show the Numbers and the Detail for Top 10, Top 50 or Top 100 Customers, Products or really anything else. And still have it fully interactive, so you can slice and dice it as you like. üëâ Download Power

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.

value.title: Combine Multiple or All Sheets from an Excel File into a Power BI solution Using Power Query Dynamic
value.excerpt: Combining multiple files from one folder is already supported built-in through the graphical interface of Power Query when use you Get Data from Folder. However, if you have one Excel file, with multiple sheets with the same structure but different data, you cannot use that option. There is a very little
